activities: We provide Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack mitigation for internet websites.  We are a cloud-based service with a scrubbing centers in the US, Hong Kong and London.
eucountries: Cyprus, Estonia, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Malta, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We only collect our customer's information, where we have legitimate business reasons to do so, in the course of mitigating a distributed denial of service. From our website we only collect name, address, title, phone, e-mail address, company name and industry in conjunction with requests for information on our services. This data is not manually processed.
recoursemech: Unresolved complaints can be resolved through EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
